description:
One of Dandy`s partners, he is a dimwit cat-like alien from the Betelgeuse star, whose alien breed is named after the star. Like Dandy, he enjoys ogling the girls at "Boobies" and is never seen without his touch screen phone. His name, "Meow", was given to him by Dandy since neither he nor QT could understand his real name.
Source: ANN
name: Meow
